hero.title: Invest easily on the multi-market platform Trillions
hero.desc: Trade global stocks, popular crypto assets, national currencies, and ETFs from a single app

traders.title: Платформа для трейдеров
traders.secondary-title: Global markets, right in your hand
traders.desc: Trade global stocks, top crypto assets, currencies, and ETFs — all in one app

titles.first: A simple way to build a forward-looking portfolio that exceeds expectations
titles.second: Trade from your mobile phone or computer anywhere

text.first: Trade stocks, cryptocurrency, ETFs, and FX from a single app 24/7
text.second: Trade from your mobile phone or computer anywhere 24/7 without limits

first.first: Eurobonds with a guaranteed yield of up to 8% per year *
first.second: Structured products with returns up to 20% per year **

desc.first: A tool that allows you to earn profit through passive participation.

titles.title-6: Flexible conditions for different types of traders

texts.text-1: Competitive fees on trading operations help increase traders’ profits.
texts.text-2: Access to various markets, including stocks, forex, cryptocurrencies, commodities, and indices.
texts.text-3: Support for popular platforms such as MetaTrader 5 with a convenient interface and functionality.
texts.text-4: Fast and high-quality assistance through multiple communication channels.
texts.text-5: Trades are executed within a few milliseconds regardless of volume.
texts.text-6: Support for both beginner and professional traders with different strategies.

accounts.title: Account types on the platform
accounts.desc: The account is suitable for beginner users and intermediate-level investors.
accounts.secondary-text: Each type offers the option to open an “Islamic account,” compliant with AAOIFI standards and all Sharia requirements.

standart.desc: The account is suitable for beginner users and intermediate-level investors.

pro.desc: The account is suitable for professionals, companies, and other major players.
